Fashun Fashun

Once, he led the assembly to Mount Lu to stay in seclusion during the summer.
The ground was full of insects and ants, so they could not plant vegetables.
Fashun feared that they would be harmed.
He pointed out the location and told the insects to move elsewhere.
Before long, he went to inspect the area.
As he had predicted, there were no insects there.
At one time, he suffered from a swelling that oozed pus.
Some people respectfully touched it with their fingers.
Some wiped it with a cloth.
Soon after, he recovered.
The remaining pus emitted a fragrance that was difficult to compare.
The cloth used to wipe it still carried the fragrance that did not dissipate.

I have caused you a lot of trouble. The dragon then released the monk.
